name: Nightmares (itch) (Den Normale)
description:
Install instructions

How to download:

  1. Download either the x64 or x86 .zip file
  2. Extract the .zip file where you want the game
  3. Run the Nightmares.exe file
  4. Have Fun

Controls:

  • Move using W, A, S, and D
  • Shoot using the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON
  • Open menu using ESCAPE
